name: 林彥良
objective: This course is intended to provide a review of essential grammar skills as a background for students to construct sentences that convey ideas effectively and clearly. The main content includes the correction of sentence fragments, run-on sentences, misplaced modifiers, dangling modifiers, and faulty parallelism. Further focus is placed on varying syntactical structure, and on avoiding errors related to commonly confused words, slang, pretentious wording, cliches, and wordiness.
schedule: A detailed syllabus will be distributed on the first day of class.
